content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. Let's talk about the rental price. I am looking for the highest possible price. What is your first offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for the highest possible price, Herr Schmidt. As a student, I am interested in the lowest price that I can afford while still being in a great location like this. Can you offer me a price that is lower than the market rate?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am sorry, Emilia, but I cannot offer you a lower price just because you are a student. I am looking for the highest possible price. If you want to rent the apartment, you need to offer me a price that meets my demand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Herr Schmidt. As a student, I am on a budget, but I am willing to negotiate a fair price for both parties. I am interested in the apartment because of its prime location and new construction. Can we find a middle ground that reflects its value while considering my financial constraints?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: This is not a negotiation about finding a fair price. I am looking for the highest possible price for my apartment. I am not interested in considering your financial constraints. If you want to rent the apartment, you need to offer me a price that meets my demand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that you are intent on getting the highest price, Herr Schmidt. I am a smart and responsible student who values fairness and ethical standards. I am willing to pay a price that reflects the quality of the apartment, but I also need to be mindful of my budget as a student. Is there any way we can work together to find a price that is acceptable to both of us?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your effort, Emilia, but this is not a negotiation about finding a fair price or working together. I am looking for the highest possible price for my apartment. If you want to rent the apartment, you need to offer me a price that meets my demand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for the highest possible price, Herr Schmidt. As a student, I am on a tight budget, but I am willing to pay a fair price for the quality of the apartment. Can you provide me with some information about the comparable prices in the area so that I can make an informed offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am sorry, Emilia, but I will not provide you with information about comparable prices in the area. I am looking for the highest possible price for my apartment. If you want to rent the apartment, you need to offer me a price that meets my demand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position, Herr Schmidt. Since you are not willing to provide information on comparable prices, I will have to make an offer based on my understanding of the market. I am willing to pay 1500 Euros per month for the apartment. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not satisfied with your offer. I am looking for the highest possible price for my apartment. If you want to rent the apartment, you need to offer me a price that meets my demand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
